import React, { useState } from 'react' const BlogAdd = () => { const[formData, setFormData] = useState({ title:'', content:'', category:'', file:null, }) const[uploading, setUploading] = useState(false) const handleChange=(e)=>{ const{name, value} = e.target.value setFormData((prevData) => ({ ...prevData, [name]: value, })); } return(
